statements: SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id > 2 AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information INNER JOIN support_tickets ON customer_information.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_phone DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_status FROM customer_information JOIN support_tickets ON customer_information.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description FROM customer_information INNER JOIN support_tickets ON customer_information.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Resolved');
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, customer_id FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, team_id FROM support_agents WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE support_agent_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, ticket_description FROM customers LEFT JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id;
SELECT agent_name, email_address, phone_number FROM support_agents WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT customer_name, email_address, ticket_description, ticket_status FROM customers JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id ORDER BY ticket_status ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, department, email FROM support_agents WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT agent_name, department, email FROM support_agents WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND ticket_id > 100 ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, ticket_id, interaction_timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Chat' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, email FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, status, priority FROM tickets WHERE priority = 'High';
SELECT comment_id, comment, created_at FROM ticket_comments WHERE ticket_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, email, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM support_agents JOIN tickets ON support_agents.agent_id = tickets.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name, email;
SELECT ticket_id, status, priority FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND priority = 'High';
SELECT ticket_id, MAX(created_at) AS latest_comment_date FROM ticket_comments GROUP BY ticket_id ORDER BY latest_comment_date DESC;
